# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a waiting reason with a string value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: A string value that corresponds to a defined [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/WaitingReason].
title: init(rawValue:)
